extendedInfo.description: To get the best hotel rates every time, simply search by location, date and number of guests and  Hotels Booking 80% Discount quickly finds you the best deals in ANY Countries.There are no fees, no mark-ups and it is FREE to use.Features include:â¢ Simple search by location, dates and guestsâ¢ âAround Meâ search to find what is available around you at that exact momentâ¢ Search results can be viewed two ways - on a map or in a list formatâ¢ Interactive map with zoom in, zoom out, and swipe to reveal more hotels â¢ View all hotel details, guest ratings, images and features the hotel offersâ¢ Comparison table for all hotels and the best rates available for all our partner booking sitesâ¢ Refine your search by price, star ratings, areas, hotel features and moreâ¢ Book with our partner websites by simply clicking âbookâ on your hotel of choiceâ¢ Big image gallery â¢ Apps in 39languagesâ¢ The only app that allow you to search the hotel deals through out www.Agoda.com, www.Expedia.com, www.booking.comlastminute.compriceline.comhotels4u.comhostelbookers.comlaterooms.comeasytobook.comvenere.comHotelclub.comholidayinn.comMarriottSkooshCrowne PlazaOne search and our app will search all the listed hotels in the listed website above and give you the best prices in one screen for all the deals.  Hostel and motel listing is also in our app.  Book your room now!
